trans-unit.source: The WINDOWPOS structure contains information about the size and position of a window

seg-source.mrk: The WINDOWPOS structure contains information about the size and position of a window

target.mrk: The WINDOWPOS structure contains information about the size and position of a window

trans-unit.source: Handle to the window

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the window in Z order

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the position of the window in Z order

target.mrk: Specifies the position of the window in Z order

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the left edge of the window

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the position of the left edge of the window

target.mrk: Specifies the position of the left edge of the window

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the top edge of the window

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the position of the top edge of the window

target.mrk: Specifies the position of the top edge of the window

trans-unit.source: Specifies the window width, in pixels

target.mrk: Specifies the window width, in pixels

target.mrk: Specifies the window height, in pixels

trans-unit.source: Specifies the window position. This member can be one or more of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the window position.
This member can be one or more of the following values:

target.mrk: Specifies the window position.
This member can be one or more of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $SWP_DRAWFRAME - Draws a frame around the window

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_DRAWFRAME - Draws a frame around the window

target.mrk: $SWP_DRAWFRAME - Draws a frame around the window

trans-unit.source: $SWP_FRAMECHANGED - Sends a WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not being changed

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_FRAMECHANGED - Sends a WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not being changed

target.mrk: $SWP_FRAMECHANGED - Sends a WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not being changed

trans-unit.source: $SWP_HIDEWINDOW - Hides the window

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_HIDEWINDOW - Hides the window

target.mrk: $SWP_HIDEWINDOW - Hides the window

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOACTIVATE - Does not activate the window

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_NOACTIVATE - Does not activate the window

target.mrk: $SWP_NOACTIVATE - Does not activate the window

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOCOPYBITS - Discards the entire contents of the client area

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_NOCOPYBITS - Discards the entire contents of the client area

target.mrk: $SWP_NOCOPYBITS - Discards the entire contents of the client area

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOMOVE - Retains the current position (ignores the x and y parameters)

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_NOMOVE - Retains the current position (ignores the x and y parameters)

target.mrk: $SWP_NOMOVE - Retains the current position (ignores the x and y parameters)

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOOWNERZORDER - Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_NOOWNERZORDER - Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order

target.mrk: $SWP_NOOWNERZORDER - Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOREDRAW - Does not redraw changes

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_NOREDRAW - Does not redraw changes

target.mrk: $SWP_NOREDRAW - Does not redraw changes

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOREPOSITION - Same as the SWP_NOOWNERZORDER flag

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_NOREPOSITION - Same as the SWP_NOOWNERZORDER flag

target.mrk: $SWP_NOREPOSITION - Same as the SWP_NOOWNERZORDER flag

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOSENDCHANGING - Prevents the window from receiving the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING message

target.mrk: $SWP_NOSENDCHANGING - Prevents the window from receiving the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING message

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOSIZE - Retains the current size (ignores the cx and cy parameters)

target.mrk: $SWP_NOSIZE - Retains the current size (ignores the cx and cy parameters)

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOZORDER - Retains the current Z order (ignores the InsertAfter parameter)
